subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Curt Schilling could have retired after the Boston Red Sox won the World Series last fall, but he quickly agreed to an $8 million contract for one last season. Now, a shoulder injury could ruin the final flourish to a decorated career.
snippet: Curt Schilling could have retired after the Boston Red Sox won the World Series last fall, but he quickly agreed to an $8 million contract for one last season. Now, a shoulder injury could ruin the final flourish to a decorated career.
